title: World Glaucoma Week from March 6-12
body_lines: The National Eye Hospital organised a special media conference to announce the World Glaucoma Week from March 6-12.
The keynote address on how to challenge Glaucoma was delivered by Dr. Lalitha Senarath, on the focal point of the Glaucoma programme.
A task of action plan to raise more awareness on glaucoma for the year 2022 was also presented at the event. Pix by Kithsiri De Mel
